Packages.Package-Description: Ideal for smaller homes where you will consume the majority of what you produce.
This is a fantastic offer that gives you solar power and battery storage, meaning you can maximise your savings all year round.
Our best value package for larger homes that need a large amount of energy.

Accessory-Card.Accessory-Text:
Add Battery Storage from only £3500 to accelerate your savings over the lifespan of your solar install.

A 5kWh battery could save you £483* per year by charging on off-peak energy alone.

A battery also helps you to capture excess solar energy to use at expensive peak times.

*Standard Tariff (34p) vs Octopus Intelligent (7.5p) by charging 5kWh off-peak per day for a year.

Hero.Heading: Solar Panels Packages installed
Hero.Sub-Heading: Helping people & businesses save money and the planet

About-Us.About-Text: We are a leading provider of solar panel installations in Yorkshire and surrounding areas. Our expert team delivers sustainable energy solutions, including efficient solar systems, to create a greener future for the region.

Process.name: Free Consultation
Process.text: Once you we have received your enquiry, one of team will arrange a free consultation with you, either in person or virtually. No pushy salesman and we’ll advise what we think is best for you.

Process.name: Quoting Stage
Process.text: After our meeting, we will send you a formal quote of work, this might be two different options depending on what’s discussed. Once we get your approval, we will send you an invoice to get started with your install.

Process.name: Install
Process.text: Scaffolding will be erected around your property, this takes approximately one day. Once your scaffolding is up, our team will arrive and install your panels, then our qualified electricians will install your inverter and/or batteries. This takes one to two days.

Process.name: MCS Certification
Process.text: Once the install is complete, we will apply on your behalf for your MCS Certificate (so you can be paid for export payments) through your DNO. We will send you the certificate when it is issued. This can take a few weeks depending on how busy the DNO are.
